summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; providing for certain improvements and construction work within the City and at Ruby Dam site out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as parts of, and additions and betterments to and extensions of the existing municipal light and power plant and system contemplated by Ordinances Nos. 58871, 54006 (as amended), and 64065; and authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
